name: Rex's Revenge
description:
Developed by a team of University Students (Team Buttered Chicken) for a first-year module, Rex's Revenge is a short, arcade-style, side-scroller with small comedic touches to hopefully entertain anyone who plays.

After much play-testing, the team discovered that Rex's Revenge is great for speedrunners who don't have time to commit to hour-long runs with runs averaging around the 1 min 10-sec area.

Team Buttered Chicken consists of 2 designers, 3 artists, and 1 coder. Rex's Revenge was their first project as a team.

Joseph "Joe" Barry - Code

Matthew Chapman - Design

Tom Dowker - Design

Rhianna Dennis - Art

Nathan Thomas - Art

Yasmin Wilson - Art
